Ultimo stared in disblelief. There was no way Hellpeon could control that much energy, yet he was, but the energy must have been super disrupted.  Ultimo tried to think of something, any thing to save his hide.  He turned off the energy field, then bringing back his arm thrgouh it forward sending his shield flying through the air at the ball in Hellpeons hand.  The shield could be jsut enough to disrupt the enregy ball causing it to explode, unfortunatly, Ultimo was still within the range of the explosionshould it happen.

nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
> As Ultimos orb approached the one in hellpeons hands, it began to 
> fizzle and go flat before it streched and went straight into the orb 
> in front of him making it bigger. Then energy began to go into the 
> orb from Ultimos Energy field. Hellpeon cackled at this as the orb 
> ebgan to glow and crackle brilliantly.
